query: I just ran setup.js on a brand new project. Let's do the inception session to establish what we're building.
CLAUDE.md Project Context is still a placeholder. Let's fill it in with a proper conversation about the project.
We're starting a completely new project from scratch. Help me set up the initial context — what is this project, who is it for, what are the constraints.
Let's establish what we're building before writing any code. I want to define the IFR and map the system context.
We're adding a major new module to the project that needs its own context. Let's do a scoped onboarding for it.
The project has no CLAUDE.md context, no constitution, no design docs. Let's start from the beginning.
I need to set up a new project with Rolling Weft. Walk me through the inception conversation.
Create the root bead and seed the initial project context based on what we discuss.
Let's define the ideal final result for this project and map out the tensions and constraints.
This project was just initialized. Let's have the conversation to figure out what we're actually building.
Fix the login bug — users get a 403 after session expires.
Add a new API endpoint for fetching user preferences.
Investigate why the gRPC connection drops under load.
Update the design document for the notification service.
Let's review the assumptions before closing this bead.
Save findings and do a compound pass before compacting.
Set up the constitution gates for COM threading constraints.
Create a bead for the payment integration task.
Run the test suite and fix any failing tests.
Help me optimize the database query that's causing slow page loads.
